Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People on social media in Australia are sharing opinions and recommendations ahead of the federal budget. The Women's Economic Equality Taskforce's letter of budget recommendations as well as a petition to scrap the Stage 3 tax cuts are among the most discussed topics. The need to improve conditions for the most disadvantaged and to ensure that truth matters to politicians are also hotly debated. Nonetheless some posts contain simple expressions of love or links to external websites without providing much context.
